item.title: FT Most Read: Wednesday, January 29, 2025 at 3:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. OpenAI says it has evidence China’s DeepSeek used its model to train competitor
2. Musk clashed with Tangen over Norway oil fund’s vote against Tesla pay
3. US judge blocks Trump’s plan to freeze federal grants and loans
4. The baby gap: why governments can’t pay their way to higher birth rates
5. [Opinion] We will have to learn to live with machines that can think
item.guid: FT Most Read: Wednesday, January 29, 2025 at 3:15 PM UTC
